body:
Just ran with `golang.org/x/tools` at `a09dffbb6c9a92df8f0380ce64dc56316d3af9a1` and `go` at `8d5ff2e182c52c4fa6af18e536dcef6e12ad8cb2` and got the same error.

```
panic: imported["github.com/golang/tools/godoc/dl"].err = open /Users/thomas/go/src/github.com/golang/tools/godoc/dl: too many open files

created by main.main
```
